name: Wanderers Troupe
4_set_bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

name: Viridescent Venerer
4_set_bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponents Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

name: Traveling Doctor
4_set_bonus: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

name: Tiny Miracle
4_set_bonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Thundersoother
4_set_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

name: Thundering Fury
4_set_bonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

name: The Exile
4_set_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Scholar
4_set_bonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

name: Retracing Bolide
4_set_bonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

name: Resolution of Sojourner
4_set_bonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

name: Noblesse Oblige
4_set_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party memebers ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Martial Artist
2_set_bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
4_set_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

name: Maiden Beloved
4_set_bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

name: Lucky Dog
4_set_bonus: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

name: Lavawalker
4_set_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

name: Instructor
4_set_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

name: Icebreaker
4_set_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies in a Frozen state or affected by cryo by 35%.

name: Gladiators Finale
4_set_bonus: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

name: Glacier and Snowfield
4_set_bonus: Increases Superconduct DMG by 50%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG by 25% for 10s.

name: Gambler
4_set_bonus: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Defenders Will
4_set_bonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

name: Crimson Witch of Flames
4_set_bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

name: Brave Heart
4_set_bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

name: Bloodstained Chivalry
4_set_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

name: Berserker
4_set_bonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

name: Archaic Petra
4_set_bonus: Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% RES to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental RES can be gained in this manner at any one time.

name: Adventurer
4_set_bonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.
